| Esperanto: | uses [diacritics](/wiki/Diacritics Diacritics")  (ĉ, ĝ, ĥ, ĵ, ŝ, ŭ)  and a digraph  (dz)"
| Example: | Translation of chamber", "shoe", and "square":   _ **ĉ** ambro_ / _**ŝ** uo_ / _**kv** adrato_ (Esp.)   _ **ch** ambro_ / _**sh** uo_ / _**qu** adrato_ (Ido)"

| Ido: | gender-neutral by default;  masculine and  feminine optional

| Example: | Translation of big dogs":   _granda **j** hundoj_ (Esp.)   _granda hundi_ (Ido)"
| Translation of I drink milk" / "I milk drink":  "mi trinkas lakto **n** " / "mi lakton trinkas" (Esp.)  "me drinkas lakto" / "me lakton drinkas" (Ido)"
